skill_constraints: Key-person dependency on Senior Backend Developer; Single point of failure for DevOps.
resource_bottlenecks: Senior backend developer availability for high-complexity tasks.
mitigation_strategies: Aggressive pair programming and cross-training; Defer non-critical features.
